item.description: Please Join me on Monday August 18th 2008 at 7 pm at the Venetian restuarant at 909 Broad St East weymouth Ma for a Business and Social networking meet-up where we will get together and grow our businesses. Be prepared to talk about your business and what your goals are for the coming year. Expect to pay a modest amount for a delicious dinner which you can order off the menu. It is important for Business owners like ourselves to meet and know many "friends" so we can to promote each other at this networking meetup
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in a red Jacket and will have a smile on my face
item.name: Business networking and social meeting August Meetup
